column1: Today I visited the largest refugee camp at our southern border where 3000 people are waiting for months on end for their asylum claims to be processed. I was horrified by what I saw. Congress must end these atrocities! #DemsAtTheBorder #DontLookAway https://t.co/vGl43adPZb

Throughout my time in Congress I've been proud to march with women to stand with women and defend reproductive freedom. My 100% pro-choice rating and proven track record is why I'm the only Democrat in OR-04 endorsed by @PPact and @prochoiceoregon #RiseUp #WomensMarch2020 https://t.co/xEcJoqf5Cf

Right now tens of thousands of Oregonians rely on SNAP to feed themselves and their families and 19000 of them risk losing their benefits under Trump's newest rule tightening work requirements. https://t.co/qoC7lEzVPd

Trump’s reckless and impulsive actions have put our troops in harm’s way. We must do everything we can to stop this march towards war. We cannot afford to become mired in another endless conflict in the Middle East. https://t.co/jsIhzAavqT

I have been working to strengthen the War Powers Act for years in order to limit presidential authority to declare war without consulting Congress. Trump's decision to enter into hostilities with Iran has put us on the precipice of war. https://t.co/DNVyM6xQb9

The invasion of Iraq by former President Bush was the worst foreign policy mistake in U.S. history. Congress must act to rein in President Trump and reassert its constitutionally-granted power to declare war. https://t.co/djTHUjDm3u

The American people deserve to know the full scope of any potential conflict—including an exit strategy—before the U.S. considers another military campaign in the Middle East or anywhere else in the world. We don’t want another endless war.  https://t.co/tND7zNdFj2 https://t.co/yadhdOTe5j

This year we have to hold President Trump accountable at the ballot box. Now is the time to mobilize and band together save our representative democracy. https://t.co/kwenwBVgHd https://t.co/nwsuRmuVmq
As we reach the close of another year we paws 🐾 to wish you a warm and happy holiday season. -Peter Myrnie Mandy and Gimli  #happypawlidays #oregonhumanesociety https://t.co/40lhDxrs7d

I’ve read the full report from the Intelligence Committee and it’s crystal clear: President Trump abused his power and violated his oath of office to protect and defend the U.S. Constitution. No one is above the law. We will hold him accountable. https://t.co/vTr6jjLsAu

I am proud to be a cosponsor of this bill which has the potential to give growers and dispensaries access to financial services and reduce industry reliance on cash legitimizing the business to potential business investors. https://t.co/JZK0PxUXyv

Today is National Llama Day. It is always fun to see @CaesarTheLlama advocating for progressive candidates and issues all around Oregon. I have always been an animal lover which is why I am proud of my 100+ rating from @humanesociety. https://t.co/2tpBrHoyRx

This legislation will require transportation providers to develop and implement formal policies to help prevent sexual harassment and assault and help law enforcement hold accountable those who perpetrate these egregious acts. https://t.co/pL81Peql1b
Congratulations to @uoregon’s @oregonfootball for their crushing victory in tonight’s PAC-12 championship game. #uoducks #Pac12Title
Thank you for your support @CaesarTheLlama https://t.co/Uv4cmZolVy

I applaud all those at the 2019 UN Climate Change Conference who are-- as we speak-- introducing dynamic solutions and climate resilient technology that has the potential to move us towards a carbon neutral economy. https://t.co/GgCoc4Zkez

I’m extremely proud to announce that I’m the only candidate in my race to be endorsed by Planned Parenthood Action Fund. This 2020 endorsement from @PPact  means a great deal and I’m honored to be recognized for being a strong ally in the fight for reproductive equality. https://t.co/XE8MINq0oz

In 1999 I was in Seattle protesting the WTO one of the most destructive of the “pro-business anti-democracy anti-worker anti-environment” pacts the US has participated in. You can guarantee that I'll continue my work opposing these so-called "free trade" agreements. https://t.co/DkeEQksK8Q

I enjoyed touring the local training center for the plumbers and steamfitters and am appreciative of their ongoing support! Working people are the backbone of our economy. You can guarantee I’ll continue working for their rights in Congress. #unionstrong #plumbersandsteamfitters https://t.co/tFvVR1OsXV

My campaign team was thrilled to have the @oregondems donkey stop by our campaign headquarters today! Her mural depicts some of the most beautiful and diverse parts of Oregon. I am honored to represent Oregon’s Fourth Congressional District and work towards a second blue wave. https://t.co/M6X70qAJtp
I’m proud to be a leader in the fight to address climate change with @SenSanders and @AOC. #GreenNewDeal #PublicHousing https://t.co/YUJSBDIolt
Today we remember our community members who have lost their lives in acts of anti-transgender violence. As a country we must do more to protect the transgender community. https://t.co/xe2RPPkvaM
It is an honor to receive a 100+ rating from the @HumaneSociety for my record on protecting animal rights in Congress. https://t.co/wq6uZbPHxe

The @EugeneWeekly got it right. The NRCC started targeting my race in February. They’ll stop at nothing to try to flip this seat. They've hand-picked a Trump loyalist to run against me and are even meddling in the Democratic primary in an attempt to drain my campaign resources. https://t.co/2JiT8H428Y

This report from @splcenter Hatewatch blog makes it clear: White House policy advisor Stephen Miller promotes white supremacist ideology and xenophobic conspiracies from his taxpayer-funded position in the Trump administration. He should resign at once. https://t.co/VnfsoXYrML https://t.co/M2oUo4mPwv

We need federal investments in new and updated carbon capture and carbon reduction technologies. I love seeing green bold creative and potentially viable ideas growing into economic opportunities. Cheers🍸 https://t.co/tiiRMYQX4Q

The safety of passengers and crew should always be the top priority. I am determined to get to the bottom of this for the families of those who passed and for the safety of the traveling public. https://t.co/CGWa6Wep6L

Climate change is an emergency and the U.S. should be on the front lines leading the way into a green sustainable future not retreating! Rather than lament let's use this occasion to mobilize for 2020. https://t.co/Xqat41hfzQ https://t.co/sYbtrLba6p

Under the Trump administration's appointees the NLRB has systemically rolled back and weakened protections for hardworking Americans. The backbone of our economy relies on our diligent labor force. I am outraged by the actions of Trump’s NLRB. https://t.co/LoJtwsrAel

I’m proud to have received a 100% rating in the 115th Congress from @CommonCause  for my ability to "help amplify the voices of everyday Americans who have been silenced by big money in politics." I'm honored to have a campaign operation powered by the people for the people. https://t.co/SmwvWWVnFb

Yesterday I voted in favor of a resolution that establishes the next phase of the impeachment inquiry into the abuses of power by President Trump. He has repeatedly admitted to impeachable offenses and his grave actions threaten our national security and our democracy. https://t.co/Iw333HD2c7

My Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund legislation is a much-needed win for Oregon and our nation's coastal communities and I strongly encourage my colleagues in the Senate to pass these bills as soon as possible. https://t.co/tkIkP2fiFC

The Trump Administration’s unprecedented level of stonewalling has given me no choice but to issue a subpoena. The American people deserve to know if he is violating the Emoluments Clauses of the U.S. Constitution. I’m determined to deliver the truth to the American people. https://t.co/sfWW5GkJhB
It is an honor to once again be voted Best Local Politician by Eugene Weekly readers. During these difficult times your unwavering support is invaluable. Onward to 2020! https://t.co/7nGnhvQoBz

Exciting news: I’ve been endorsed by the Congressional Progressive Caucus! My grassroots campaign is powered by the people: 93% of my donations have come from individuals donating amounts of $250 or under. I’m proud to be recognized by the caucus for my progressive leadership. https://t.co/1Vgv7qWD8I

Transportation Secretary Elaine Chao's disproportionate number of meetings with Kentucky officials are very troubling. I will not stand by while taxpayers are being taken advantage of.  https://t.co/q8vbiFn7RT

This report makes it crystal clear: the Trump-GOP tax plan is directly benefiting the wealthy elite in this country. For the first time in America history the wealthiest 400 Americans paid a lower tax rate than any other income group! https://t.co/u5uxCU4Kdf

Receiving an early 2020 endorsement from @prochoiceamerica is an honor. I will continue to fight for  accesible and affordable healthcare and reproductive freedom for Oregonians and all Americans. https://t.co/jF01iO9B68

Congratulations to @SEIULocal503 for reaching a successful tentative agreement with Oregon’s universities providing 4500 workers with increased healthcare protections strong cost of living adjustments and improved workplace provisions. #unionstrong  https://t.co/vij7bkSPFS

I led the debate to stop Trump’s stupid border wall which will do nothing to improve our broken immigration system. He’s diverting essential funds from the Coast Guard transportation security and the military all to maintain a campaign promise-- which US taxpayers will pay for!

Withholding congressional-authorized foreign aid in exchange of support for your reelection campaign is blackmail and impeachable offense. Congress must use all of its powers to get to the bottom of this. https://t.co/06lKgXVMoN

I had a great time yesterday at the Eugene Parade rain or shine! I’m proud to be a part of this vibrant community and am honored to represent you and fight for our shared values in Congress. https://t.co/8n5ZTOSA2p

I’m proud of my longstanding record fighting for the rights of working people and labor unions. I’m humbled and honored to be named Labor Champion by the Communication Workers of America. https://t.co/spb9svLXha

Exciting news: today is the first day to file as a federal candidate in Oregon and I’m thrilled to announce that I’m running again to represent the people of Oregon’s 4th Congressional District. It continues to be an honor to fight for our shared values in Washington D.C. #2020 https://t.co/ikmbrdZSJu

September 11th is a day to remember and honor. I will #neverforget those we lost in the attack and the first responders who saved lives that day and are still struggling with health impacts from the terrorist attack. https://t.co/OjPUouTVcY
Today and every day I’m proud to stand with workers and fight for working values. Happy Labor Day! #unionstrong #laborday https://t.co/VWYQrlCwz8

Trump wants to dismantle more than two decades worth of protections to indefinitely detain children and families and lower minimum standards of care. We need real solutions to address the crisis at the border not more inhumane and un-American policies! https://t.co/IqZ7CNkohH

Today the Trump Administration weakened the #EndangeredSpeciesAct and rollback protections for 1600 of the world’s most threatened species. The Trump administration's action today is shortsighted and will have devastating impacts if not stopped. https://t.co/tSAdNPe5X1

This June was the hottest on record at an average of 60.6 degrees. The science is clear climate change is the biggest existential threat to our planet and we must take immediate bold action. https://t.co/ecYLSok0t3
https://t.co/IuFOjTlZXF https://t.co/mttH7Z9eaF

Our movement has already donated over $7000 for @KidsinNeedofDefense and I’m proud to match the first $5000. It’s absolutely critical that we take immediate action and hold the Trump administration accountable for the human rights abuses. https://t.co/ewz4dgpy4a

I’ve always fought for a woman’s right to choose and I always will! As anti-choice extremists step up their efforts I will continue to stand up to stop them. Join me in telling Congress to pass legislation to safeguard access to reproductive healthcare. #StopTheBans https://t.co/yIlXpmyqUX

I stand with the tens of thousands of people who rallied across the country yesterday to defend access to abortion healthcare. When we come together in solidarity it sends a unified message that we won’t back down in the fight for equality. https://t.co/WIY7d7Tsnn
This week is #TeacherAppreciationWeek and I want to thank all educators who go above and beyond to ensure that our students have access to a bright future. https://t.co/awzukBKi1n

It's an honor to be once again endorsed by #NARAL as a Pro-Choice champion for the 2020 cycle. It's a privilege to stand with them to defend a woman's right to choose and I'm looking forward to leading the charge to keep building our movement. https://t.co/qtDUgFzsBI
I’m honored to have been named the #3 Most Effective Lawmakers of the 115th House of Representatives by the the Center for Effective Lawmaking. https://t.co/w8sMrO0kVj

I’ve pushed for a long-term infrastructure bill that includes sustainable funding. Now as the Chair of the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee I’m determined to get it done. #DeFazioEra https://t.co/A8vgoayS1I

I’m proud to be an original co-sponsor of Congresswoman @AOC’s #GreenNewDeal resolution. Climate Change is the greatest existential threat to our planet and we need to take bold action to address it head-on. https://t.co/aXgbhlhusS

We could supply our #CoastGuard with strategic resources that would better protect our coastal borders with less than half of the budget that Trump is proposing for the wall. #TrumpShutdown  https://t.co/F0JlZLwDdV
